languages.text: "Мы двинемся следом за вами на некотором отдалении. Нужно эскортировать оставшихся гражданских — без помощи стражи они разбегутся или попадутся врагу".
"We'll follow behind you, keeping a bit of distance. We must escort the remaining civilians. Without the guard's help, they'll scatter or fall into the enemy's hands."
languages.original_text: "Мы двинемся следом за вами на некотором отдалении. Нужно эскортировать оставшихся гражданских — без помощи стражи они разбегутся или попадутся врагу".

traits.locale_text: "We'll follow behind you, keeping a bit of distance. We must escort the remaining civilians. Without the guard's help, they'll scatter or fall into the enemy's hands."
"We'll follow behind you, keeping a bit of distance. We must escort the remaining civilians. Without the guard's help, they'll scatter or fall into the enemy's hands."
"We'll follow behind you, keeping a bit of distance. We must escort the remaining civilians. Without the guard's help, they'll scatter or fall into the enemy's hands."
"We'll follow behind you, keeping a bit of distance. We must escort the remaining civilians. Without the guard's help, they'll scatter or fall into the enemy's hands."
"We'll follow behind you, keeping a bit of distance. We must escort the remaining civilians. Without the guard's help, they'll scatter or fall into the enemy's hands."
"We'll follow behind you, keeping a bit of distance. We must escort the remaining civilians. Without the guard's help, they'll scatter or fall into the enemy's hands."

languages.text: "Wir folgen Euch mit ein wenig Abstand. Wir müssen die übrigen Zivilisten eskortieren. Ohne die Hilfe der Wachen zerstreuen sie sich oder fallen dem Feind in die Hände."
languages.original_text: "We'll follow behind you, keeping a bit of distance. We must escort the remaining civilians. Without the guard's help, they'll scatter or fall into the enemy's hands."

traits.locale_text: "Wir folgen Euch mit ein wenig Abstand. Wir müssen die übrigen Zivilisten eskortieren. Ohne die Hilfe der Wachen zerstreuen sie sich oder fallen dem Feind in die Hände."

languages.text: « On va vous suivre à distance. On doit escorter les derniers civils. Sans l'aide de la garde, ils vont se disperser ou tomber entre les mains de l'ennemi. »
languages.original_text: "We'll follow behind you, keeping a bit of distance. We must escort the remaining civilians. Without the guard's help, they'll scatter or fall into the enemy's hands."

traits.locale_text: « On va vous suivre à distance. On doit escorter les derniers civils. Sans l'aide de la garde, ils vont se disperser ou tomber entre les mains de l'ennemi. »

languages.text: “我们会保持一定距离，跟在您身后。我们必须护送剩下的平民。如果没有卫兵的帮助，他们会四散奔逃，或是落入敌人手中。”
languages.original_text: "We'll follow behind you, keeping a bit of distance. We must escort the remaining civilians. Without the guard's help, they'll scatter or fall into the enemy's hands."

traits.locale_text: “我们会保持一定距离，跟在您身后。我们必须护送剩下的平民。如果没有卫兵的帮助，他们会四散奔逃，或是落入敌人手中。”

languages.text: 「我々は少し距離置いて、後ろからついて行きます。残った市民を護衛しなければなりません。護衛の助けなしでは、彼らは散り散りになるか敵の手に落ちてしまいます」
languages.original_text: "We'll follow behind you, keeping a bit of distance. We must escort the remaining civilians. Without the guard's help, they'll scatter or fall into the enemy's hands."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は少し距離置いて、後ろからついて行きます。残った市民を護衛しなければなりません。護衛の助けなしでは、彼らは散り散りになるか敵の手に落ちてしまいます」

languages.text: «Le seguiremos, manteniendo un poco de distancia. Debemos escoltar al resto de civiles. Sin la ayuda de la guardia, se dispersarán o caerán en manos del enemigo».
languages.original_text: "We'll follow behind you, keeping a bit of distance. We must escort the remaining civilians. Without the guard's help, they'll scatter or fall into the enemy's hands."

traits.locale_text: «Le seguiremos, manteniendo un poco de distancia. Debemos escoltar al resto de civiles. Sin la ayuda de la guardia, se dispersarán o caerán en manos del enemigo».

languages.text: "Biraz mesafe bırakarak peşinizden geleceğiz. Geri kalan sivillere de refakat etmeliyiz. Başlarında muhafız olmadan ya dağılırlar ya da düşmanın kucağına düşerler."
languages.original_text: "We'll follow behind you, keeping a bit of distance. We must escort the remaining civilians. Without the guard's help, they'll scatter or fall into the enemy's hands."

traits.locale_text: "Biraz mesafe bırakarak peşinizden geleceğiz. Geri kalan sivillere de refakat etmeliyiz. Başlarında muhafız olmadan ya dağılırlar ya da düşmana kıskıvrak yakalanırlar."
